mapper.update: update JH_Auth_Log set LOG_TYPE = #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOG_CONTENT = #{logContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COM_ID = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, UP_USER = #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UP_DATE = #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CR_USER = #{crUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CR_DATE = #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, LOG_TYPE, LOG_CONTENT, REMARK, IP, REMARK1, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from JH_Auth_Log where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, LOG_TYPE, LOG_CONTENT, REMARK, IP, REMARK1, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from JH_Auth_Log
